last_episode_to_air.name: No Man's Land
last_episode_to_air.overview: Lily has forced Elliot to remember more than he perhaps ever wanted to about Philby. Months later, Elliott receives a letter from Philby asking for a meeting in an East Berlin bar.

name: A Spy Among Friends
overview: Follow the defection of notorious British intelligence officer and KGB double agent, Kim Philby, through the lens of his complex relationship with MI6 colleague and close friend, Nicholas Elliott.
tagline: One of their own has done the unthinkable.

episodes.name: Boom-Ooh-Yatatatah
episodes.overview: In the wake of Kim Philby’s escape to Moscow, his closest friend in Britain’s Secret Service, Nicholas Elliott, is under investigation.

episodes.name: The Admiral's Glass
episodes.overview: Investigator Lily Thomas understands that Elliott is never going to divulge anything of value in a conventional interrogation process so she manipulates him.

episodes.name: Allegory of the Catholic Faith
episodes.overview: Philby begins to understand that the KGB can never fully trust him now that he’s in Moscow, and as far as they’re concerned, his life as a spy for them is over.

episodes.name: Vodka
episodes.overview: Elliott rattles Blunt’s cage to make him panic and then follows him to a clandestine meeting in the middle of the night.

episodes.name: Snow
episodes.overview: Elliott and Lily fear that no one can be trusted. They must get to Blunt before anyone else to interrogate him and confirm their suspicions.

episodes.name: No Man's Land
episodes.overview: Lily has forced Elliot to remember more than he perhaps ever wanted to about Philby. Months later, Elliott receives a letter from Philby asking for a meeting in an East Berlin bar.
